testcase.classname: Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type male...........................................passed And user enter first name "Shah" and last name "tester".....................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email field..................................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rdO" and "P@ssw0rdO"..................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then Success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: NOP-02 Login | users could use Login functionality
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When User do registration...................................................passed Then Success message is displayed...........................................passed When user logout............................................................passed Then user on home page......................................................passed When user go to login page..................................................passed And user login with valid email and password................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: NOP-02 Login | users could use Login functionality
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
